  10. int
  11. ‌CSpec_StartDescribe(const char *descr)
  12. {
  13.     if (CSpec_output->startDescribeFun != NULL) {
  14.         CSpec_output->startDescribeFun(descr);
  15.     }

  17.     return 0;
  18. }

  22. ‌CSpec_EndDescribe()
  23. {
  24.     if (CSpec_output->endDescribeFun != NULL) {

  26.     }
  27. }

  50. void
  51. ‌CSpec_Eval(const char *filename, int line_number, const char *assertion,
  52.     int assertionResult)
  53. {
  54.     if (CSpec_output->evalFun != NULL) {

  56.         CSpec_output->evalFun(filename, line_number, assertion,
  57.                               assertionResult);
  58.     }

  60.     if (!assertionResult) {
  61.         CSpec_output->failed++;
  62.     }
  63. }


  66. void
  67. ‌CSpec_Pending(const char *reason)
  68. {
  69.     if (CSpec_output->pendingFun != NULL) {
  70.         CSpec_output->pendingFun(reason);
  71.     }
  72. }


  75. void
  76. ‌CSpec_SetOutput(CSpecOutputStruct *output)
  77. {
  78.     CSpec_output = output;
  79. }
